author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The Conjuring Universe has grown to some surprising lengths since the first movie, titled The Conjuring, was released in 2013. With several sequels and additional spin-offs that act as about prequels and sequels, the brand has proven to be incredibly successful. Now the first trailer for The Conjuring: Last Rites – which is acting as [...]

The post ‘The Conjuring: Last Rites’ First Trailer Released appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘The Conjuring: Last Rites’ First Trailer Released
